WakeLock.summary: The WakeLock interface of the Screen Wake Lock API can be used to request a lock that prevents device screens from dimming or locking when an application needs to keep running.

remarks.para: This interface, and hence the system wake lock, is exposed through the property.
-Stay awake with the Screen Wake Lock API

WakeLockRequest.summary: The request() method of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that fulfills with a object if the system screen wake lock is granted.

remarks.para: The screen wake lock prevents device screens from dimming or locking when an application needs to keep running.
-Stay awake with the Screen Wake Lock API

WakeLockRequest.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with a object.
